The com moves back when the mono/xenon tank empty. Not sure why. Ill put the edited parts folder on dropbox. Fly the shuttle and give me some feedback if you want. **Edited <time datetime="2015-08-21T03:07:52Z" title="08/21/2015 03:07  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 21, 2015</time> by XxDARKWOLF67Xx**

Tail is structured just right to have all the features. Conyrol surface, both speed brakes rotating different ways, aeto etc. You can of course change aero but change other things and it will be strange to operate. 

The 'internal fuel tank' is at models COM. When it drains the engines become the heavy part so weight is shifted there.

Set it up so when its empty or near empty the com is at its optimum position.

During ascent it will be front heavy but it doesnt matter.

Ok. I went back in a re-distributed lift and fixed com/col positions. When the tanks empty the com moves to the col. I also re balanced the control surfaces for the brick flight.. Im really happy with it. [https://www.dropbox.com/s/dlblj8uw69l7sv9/Parts.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/dlblj8uw69l7sv9/Parts.zip?dl=0) I think its update worthy. But thats for you to decide. I think i got the hang of this. Its alot easier than it looks. But i still have alot to learn!
